anya-e0105n34:1: Paramatthajotikaṁ nāma khuddakapāṭhassa ceva suttanipātassa ca aṭṭhakathaṁ kenacipi anāyācito attano icchāvaseneva akāsi. Vuttañhetaṁ khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāya ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n34:7: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṁ yasmā, navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ.
anya-e0105n34:12_0: Bahū pana vicakkhaṇā imā ārambhagāthāyo vicinitvā “netaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa
anya-e0105n34:12_1: viya vacanaṁ hotī”ti vadanti. Ayañca nesaṁ vicinanākāro, ācariyabuddhaghoso hi yaṁ
anya-e0105n34:12_2: kañci ganthaṁ sīlādiguṇasampannena aññena āyācitova karoti, idha pana kocipi āyācako
anya-e0105n34:12_4: ca “mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmaggaṁ nissāya karissāmī”ti ca evaṁ paṭiññaṁ katvāva
anya-e0105n34:12_5: karoti, idha pana tādisīpi paṭiññā natthi. Punapi ācariyo atigambhīratthānaṁ catunnañcāgamānaṁ
anya-e0105n34:12_6: abhidhammassa ca saṁvaṇṇanārambhepi dukkarabhāvaṁ na katheti, idha pana “sāsanaṁ
anya-e0105n34:12_7: abodhantena mādisenā”ti attanā sāsanassa abuddhabhāvaṁ pakāsetvā “atidukkarā”ti ca
anya-e0105n34:12_8: katheti. Tasmā “netaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosassa viya vacana”nti vadanti. Taṁ yuttaṁ viya
anya-e0105n34:12_9: dissati, ācariyo hi attano ganthanigamanesu “tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe
anya-e0105n34:12_10: satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvenā”ti attano ñāṇappabhāvaṁ pakāsesi, so “sāsanaṁ
anya-e0105n34:12_11: abodhantena mādisena atidukkarā”ti īdisaṁ vacanaṁ na katheyyayevāti.
